mapper.sql: u.id id, u.id userId, u.id userNo, u.user_name userName, u.login_name loginName, u.status status

sql.where:
u.status = 1
and u.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.loginName like CONCAT('%',#{loginName},'%')
and u.id like CONCAT('%',#{userNo},'%')
and u.status = #{status}

mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.login_password AS password FROM user u WHERE u.status = 1 and u.login_name = #{loginName}
SELECT count(1) FROM user u WHERE u.status = 1 and u.id = #{userId} and u.login_password = #{loginPassword}
